}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "WPIA-102AG_V02" and "ENG-703-3602" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device has an additional model of SL-3045. :P/N: 16-0946-000 Rev AA
==Links of Interest== [http://madwifi-project.org/wiki/Compatibility/3Com#Wireless11abgPCIAdapter3CRDAG675 On the '''madwifi-project''' wiki] :10b7:0013 PCI ID
